text: ...my head...
... where am I ???
... he's stabilized for now.
Keep him in the ICU untill ...
Normal ecg, bp, and hr...
PERFECT!
Who are all these people?
... I'm in a hospital???
What happened???
Nurse!
Nurse!!!
So tired ...
I better head back to my bed.
I must have had some sort of accident.
I can`t remember a thing.
I need to find a nurse to tell me what's going on...
Excuse me nurse.
and who do we have here...
Mystery Man?!
YOU'RE AWAKE!!!
[The blood suddenly drains from your head...]
... but he was doing so well,
walking around smiling.
Impossible! Not in that condition.
Are you sure you didn't imagine it?
OF COURSE I DIDN'T IMAGINE IT!!!
Ok, ok! I'm sorry!
Well there's not much I can do. We don't even know his name.
With a tumor that size he's got a year tops.
Besides it's lunch break and they're cooking my favorite...
PEPERONI PIZZA!
[The doctor leaves in a hurry]
Why does he get so excited about pepperoni pizza!?
I think things you cannot.
You will be me.
A brain tumor?
A year to live!!!
I must have dreamt it. My dreams have been extremely vivid lately.
That nurse should be able to clear things up...
Is it true nurse, do I have a brain tumor?
Mystery Man?!
DON'T SNEAK UP ON ME LIKE THAT!!!
Please forgive me for shouting.
Unfortunately it's true.
And only a year to live?
I'm sorry.
The tumor has spread throughout your brain and is inoperable.
Do you have any friends and family I can contact for you?
[Wait a minute who even am I?]
I don't even know my own name
Oh my!
Well no matter, we'll be your new family!
We're not the biggest hospital but that just makes everything more cosey!
We have a beautiful garden and a cute little cat and ...
Nurse! Nurse! Can I go play now?
Oh, it looks like little Javi wants to play football again.
Well Man of Mystery you get back to bed now and get some rest!
This place again?!
I don't like it here.
I need to find a way out!
What just happened?
It felt so real.
It WAS real! I was inside my body just now.
Could it be the brain tumor ...
[The curtain draws open as a bubbly middle age woman appears in front of your bed]
Guess who's got your favorite treats...
Oh my, I'm sorry. I must have got the wrong bed.
I would give you a sweetie to make up for it but these are all for my son Javi.
He loves them so much he'd hate it if I gave any away hehe!
[The woman opens the curtain to the bed across from you]
Guess who's got your favorite treats!
But I'm not hungry!
Nonsense! Look at you, your skin and bones
I can't have all the lovely doctors and nurses thinking I don't take care of my boy.
Now come on, eat up!
ok
So how are you feeling Mr ... erm ... well what is your name? Let me see, it appears the nurse has wrote Mystery. So Mr Mystery how are we feeling today?
I feel like I was in my body just now. Maybe my brain. And I was fighting pathogens with my immune cells.
It was so real.
Have any patients managed to beat brain tumors by going into their bodies so to speak?
Oh dear, he's declining more rapidly than I thought (he mumbles to himself)
It's not possible to go into your body and fight pathogens, whatever that means.
It's best you just accept your condition as it is
Sure some people do get better from it but nobody knows how or why
You should try to just enjoy the pleasures of life, like candy!
[The doctor walks to the boys bed across and reaches for some candy.]
Get your hands off!
[She slaps the doctors hand]
These are for my son and my son only!
It's fine you can have them. I'm full.
What have I told you Javi? These are for you and for you only.
No football until you finish them!
And you doctor. I would expect better than trying to take candy from a child!
I'm sorry Miss, they just looked so delicious.
Anyway, you're looking well Javi!
You know we just might be ready to let you home by the end of tomorrow!
Oh boy really?!
Yes really!
Just don't forget how your favorite doctor patched you up when you become a famous soccer star, ha ha!
You wake to a large commotion across from you, nurses and doctors running in and out
[You see that one nurse you recognise from before]
Nurse! What's going on?
Poor Javi has fallen ill again, we don't know why
Please excuse me.
My poor boy! Why do bad things always happen to me!?
There there. It's going to be ok.
The doctors are working as hard as the can
He's stabilizing.
Thank god!
What did we miss!
Nurse! Stay at his bedside for the rest of your shift.
He needs close monitoring
Contact me if there is the slightest change in his condition!
Is he going to be alright?
For now.
[The doctors and nurses keep buzzing around the boys bed for the rest of the day]
[You wake up to see Javi sleeping or possibly unconcious with his mum dutifully beside him also asleep.]
I should find out whats going on with him
I don't want to disturb his resting mum.
I should go find that nurse
Excuse me nurse.
Oh, Mr Mystery!
Just give me a second while I see to Sofias feeding tube.
Poor Sofia. Shes been in a coma for over 10 years now.
She got in some kind of accident when she was 20
Her family barely visit anymore
I think they moved away. I guess it was all too depressing for them
I like to talk her about my day.
I think she can hear me you know.
Were all the family she has left...
All done!
So what can I do for you?
I was just wondering what was happening with the boy across from me.
Hes ok for now. Though it was a close one.
He was doing so well...
It's happened before too. I just hope the doctors can figure out whats going on.
Anyway, your looking a little unsteady. I think you should go back to bed for now.
[The next few days you spend mostly sleeping. Javi still hasn't woken.]
I need to get up and move around!
[You find yourself sitting next to Sofias bed]
It's so sad. Are you trapped in there or are you just sleeping?
You reach out to grab her hand.
Suddenly a spark jolts through your brain!
It's happening again!
Who's that? Sofia!?
Wait. It can't be!?
Another person???
You're Sofia? You can hear me?
You're actually alive in here?
How do you know my name?
Are you just a figment of my imagination???
No time to explain. Enemies approach!
Was that real?!
I need to get back to Sofia! I have to help her escape!
Sofia? Can you hear me?
[No response but you know she's in there!]
You reach out to grab her hand.
Suddenly a spark jolts through your brain!
Thank god your still here.
You're back!
As soon as you left I collapsed and woke up back in this prison!
Let me get you out of there!
It looks like the path we cleared earlier leads to the way out.
Oh dear more pathogens in our way. Are you ready?
I'd rather die than go back to that prison!
Bring it on!
Ok, here goes!
This is really tiring me out!
I can go to Sofias bioverse any time I want. But I should take care to not overexert myself
If I need to heal I can sleep in for the day or ask the nurse for help
I should try to rescue Sofia as soon as I can.
I've got a bizzare feeling that it'll all come to a head in a weeks time!
I've got an uneasy feeling about today.
I have to break Sofia out by the end of today!
No backing down!
Wake up Mystery man! Wake up!
You'll never believe it!
Sofia has woke up!!!
After 10 years she's awake haha!
Bizzarely she wants to see you?!
I guess talking to her in her sleep did work after all.
Well? Say something!
I err... can't believe it.
wow!
[The nurse wisks you off to ward A]
We think your immune system just finally go the upper hand on whatever was keeping you down.
Your B-Cell and Natural Killer Cell counts are way up
Yeah that's probably it!
Mystery, is that you?
Sofia?
It worked!
You’re real. I wasn’t sure. Some days I thought you were just a dream.
But you were always there. Always fighting for me.
I didn't know if you'd remember anything...
But yeah. I was there.
I saw what you were fighting. That prison. It was... brutal.
I remember flashes. Shadows. And your voice.
You kept talking to me. I think... it helped me stay anchored.
Well... I didn’t exactly have a script.
But I guess something worked, huh?
It did. You did.
So... what now?
Now we both get to wake up.
Together.
I'd like that.
Let's start over. Properly, this time.
Hi, I'm Sofia.
Hey, Sofia.
I'm err ... well I actually don't know. But... I guess people have started calling me Mystery.
Mystery, huh? That fits.
Nice to finally meet you for real, Mystery man.
You too, Sleeping Beauty.
... oh man that was cheesey!
I'm sorry.
[Suddenly you start feeling dizzy and stumble]
[The nurse suddenly appears. Has she been listening this entire time?]
Lets get you back to bed.
You shouldn't over exert yourself with that tumor.
Brain tumor?
Don't tell me...
Oh yeah. You wouldn't know.
Mr Mystery is here with his own problems.
[The nurse explains your situation to Sofia then helps you back to your bed]
Hey. You awake?
Mmm... kinda.
Feels like I got hit by a truck... then hugged by it?
You look better than yesterday.
Less mystery man, more sleepy puppy.
Wow, thanks. That’s the confidence boost I needed.
You always this charming after ten years in a coma?
Only for people who fight dream demons on my behalf.
Seriously though... how *did* you get in there?
Honestly? I don’t know exactly.
I think it has something to do with the tumor in my head.
So all that... the dream realm, the battles... it was real, but only because your brain is breaking?
Yeah. Lucky me, huh?
Turned my slow death into a fantasy co-op game.
Then maybe we can beat it the same way.
Figure out how you crossed over... go back in... and fight *your* monsters now.
You want to help me?
We barely know each other outside of nightmares and giant dream bacteria.
Well, you *did* spend your days talking to me while I was unconscious.
aaaand helped me brake out of that coma.
Feels like I owe you at least one life-saving adventure.
I suppose it's only fair.
Then it’s settled. We find a way back in, and we fix you too.
Alright... Operation: Dream Dive. I’m in.
[You smile at her, but your vision starts to blur.]
Just... give me five minutes to nap first...
Sean?
Hey—are you okay?
[The nurse rushes in, checking your vitals.]
Don’t worry, this happens when he overexerts. He’ll be fine.
He just needs rest. Again.
Get some sleep, Mystery man.
We’ve got work to do when you wake up.
Hows my special boy today?
Whoops, sorry, wrong bed, haha!
[How does she keep getting it muddled up?]
No problem. The nurse tells me Javi is doing much better!
You think? I'm not so sure.
Anyway, I've brought him his favourite sweets. That'll be sure to pick him right up!
Guess whos got your favorite sweeties?
All right!
The doctor says I'm doing much better again.
Maybe I'll get to go home soon!
Don't get ahead of yourself boy.
You still look sick to me!
Well I don't feel it!
Hey Mr!
Who me?
Yeah you. Mystery Man right? Wanna go play some football?
Just some heads and v's in the garden. I know you can't do too much exercise.
[I surely have enough energy for a little heads and vs. Besides, he's so excited I don't want to let him down.]
Sure, I'll play!
All right!
Stop harrassing the nice young man Javi.
Besides you're not doing anything until you've had your lunch
You're awake again!
Barely. You try recovering when everyone keeps calling you 'mystery man'.
I’m starting to think that *is* my real name.
Well, I *was* going to invite you back into the realm of dreams, but now I’m not so sure you’re up for it, Mr. Sass.
Okay okay. Serious face.
So... you really want to try it? Go back in?
I do. If there's a chance we can use that place to heal you—or anyone else—we should try.
Agreed. But we’re going to need a plan. Controlled entry. Focus.
Maybe—
...Mom... I feel... dizzy...
Javi? Javi?? Someone help!!
[The nurse rushes in and checks his pulse.]
He's crashing—get the doctor, now!
[The doctor runs in, barking instructions to the nurse.]
Get the oxygen ready. We need to stabilize him. No delays.
No... not the boy...
He was just talking a second ago...
Vitals are stabilizing. That was close.
He’ll need rest. Let’s keep him under observation tonight.
We have to help him.
Yeah. Tomorrow... we go in.
We find out what's haunting him... and we stop it.
Wake up... wake up.
... I'm awake ...
You ready?
Yeah just give me a sec.
So how we guna do this?
We'll, when I did it with you I had to hold your hand.
Then I concentrated really hard on the other place.
Then boom. I was there.
Okay lets quickly give it a try whilst the nurses are gone!
[You move to the seats on each side of the boys bed and each grab one of his hands.]
Okay. Now focus ... focus!
... woah!
You did it!!!
I did?!
I'm still not used to it
Where is everyone?
No pathogens, no boy. Just a big empty football pitch.
We should look around, he'll be here somewhere.
We've been walking around for ages...
What's going on?
I don't know why you're asking me?!
Like I know how any of this works!
Wait...
Over there on the substitutes bench!
huh!?
What are you guys doing in my dream.
Javi! It's a pleasure to meet you.
Well I should explain. You see it's like, err ... mystery?
Errm ... well see we've come here to help you out.
Like, look at it like this. Somethings keeping you sick.
Until you face up to it and beat it, you'll stay sick
and we're here to help you.
Really?! You guys would help me? That's awesome!
But who do we need to beat?
It's just me alone on this football pitch always...
Well I'm not sure but somethings got to be holding you here!
First we find out what it is!
Look at it this way!
It's half time. Our teams 2-0 down.
But now we're coming on as super subs to turn the whole game around!
Alright!
Lets go get 'em!
That's the spirit!
Now we just need to find them!
What are they doing here?
Nurse wake them up and return them to there beds!
Wakey wakey!
Awww, I almost didn't want to wake you. You're both so cute, making sure Javi has company!
But I'm afraid the doctor must seen the boy now.
And his mother can keep him company for the rest of the night.
But we were just...
oh never mind.
Well come back as soon as possible, right Mystery?
Yeah!
You hear that Javi? We'll be right back!
